005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.JsonFunctionException;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapKey;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CustomCollectors;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
024
025import java.util.Collection;
026import java.util.Collections;
027import java.util.HashMap;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.Random;
031import java.util.stream.Stream;
032
033import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
034import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
035
036public final class MapMerge {
037  private static final String NAME = "merge";
038  private static final Random RANDOM = new Random();
039  private static final IMapKey DUPLICATES_OPTION = IStringItem.valueOf("duplicates").asMapKey();
040
041  @NonNull
042  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
043      .name(NAME)
044      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
045      .deterministic()
046      .contextIndependent()
047      .focusIndependent()
048      .argument(IArgument.builder()
049          .name("maps")
050          .type(IMapItem.class)
051          .zeroOrMore()
052          .build())
053      .returnType(IMapItem.class)
054      .returnOne()
055      .functionHandler(MapMerge::executeOneArg)
056      .build();
057
058  @NonNull
059  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
060      .name(NAME)
061      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
062      .deterministic()
063      .contextIndependent()
064      .focusIndependent()
065      .argument(IArgument.builder()
066          .name("maps")
067          .type(IMapItem.class)
068          .zeroOrMore()
069          .build())
070      .argument(IArgument.builder()
071          .name("options")
072          .type(IMapItem.class)
073          .one()
074          .build())
075      .returnType(IMapItem.class)
076      .returnOne()
077      .functionHandler(MapMerge::executeTwoArg)
078      .build();
079
080  private enum Duplicates {
081    REJECT("reject", (key, v1, v2) -> {
082      throw new JsonFunctionException(
083          JsonFunctionException.DUPLICATE_KEYS,
084          String.format("Duplicate key '%s' not allowed.", key.getKey().asString()));
085    }),
086
087    USE_FIRST("use-first", (key, v1, v2) -> v1),
088    USE_LAST("use-last", (key, v1, v2) -> v2),
089    USE_ANY("use-any", (key, v1, v2) -> RANDOM.nextBoolean() ? v1 : v2),
090    @SuppressWarnings("null")
091    COMBINE(
092        "combine",
093        (key, v1, v2) -> Stream.concat(
094            v1.asSequence().stream(),
095            v2.asSequence().stream()).collect(ISequence.toSequence()));
096
097    private static final Map<String, Duplicates> BY_NAME;
098
099    @NonNull
100    private final String name;
101    @NonNull
102    private final CustomCollectors.DuplicateHandler<IMapKey, ICollectionValue> duplicateHander;
103
104    static {
105      @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap") Map<String, Duplicates> map = new HashMap<>();
106      for (Duplicates value : values()) {
107        map.put(value.getName(), value);
108      }
109      BY_NAME = Collections.unmodifiableMap(map);
110    }
111
112    @Nullable
113    public static Duplicates lookup(@NonNull String name) {
114      return BY_NAME.get(name);
115    }
116
117    Duplicates(@NonNull String name,
118        @NonNull CustomCollectors.DuplicateHandler<IMapKey, ICollectionValue> duplicateHander) {
119      this.name = name;
120      this.duplicateHander = duplicateHander;
121    }
122
123    public String getName() {
124      return name;
125    }
126
127    public CustomCollectors.DuplicateHandler<IMapKey, ICollectionValue> getDuplicateHander() {
128      return duplicateHander;
129    }
130  }
131
132  private MapMerge() {
133    // disable construction
134  }
135
136  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
137  @NonNull
138  private static ISequence<?> executeOneArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
139      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
140      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
141      IItem focus) {
142    ISequence<IMapItem<?>> maps = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
143
144    return ISequence.of(merge(maps, CollectionUtil.emptyMap()));
145  }
146
147  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
148  @NonNull
149  private static ISequence<?> executeTwoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
150      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
151      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
152      IItem focus) {
153    ISequence<IMapItem<?>> maps = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
154    IMapItem<?> options = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
155
156    return ISequence.of(merge(maps, options));
157  }
158
159  /**
160   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
161   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-merge">map:merge</a>.
162   *
163   * @param maps
164   *          a collection of maps to merge
165   * @param options
166   *          settings that affect the merge behavior
167   * @return a map containing the merged entries
168   */
169  @SuppressWarnings({ "null", "PMD.OnlyOneReturn" })
170  @NonNull
171  public static IMapItem<?> merge(@NonNull Collection<? extends Map<IMapKey, ? extends ICollectionValue>> maps,
172      @NonNull Map<IMapKey, ? extends ICollectionValue> options) {
173    if (maps.isEmpty()) {
174      return IMapItem.empty();
175    }
176
177    // handle the "duplicates" option
178    ICollectionValue duplicatesOption = options.get(DUPLICATES_OPTION);
179
180    Duplicates duplicates;
181    if (duplicatesOption == null) {
182      // default option
183      duplicates = Duplicates.USE_FIRST;
184    } else {
185      // resolve the provided option
186      IAnyAtomicItem atomicValue = FnData.fnData(duplicatesOption.asSequence()).getFirstItem(true);
187      if (atomicValue == null) {
188        throw new JsonFunctionException(
189            JsonFunctionException.INVALID_OPTION,
190            String.format("Missing '%s' option value.", DUPLICATES_OPTION.getKey().asString()));
191      }
192      String duplicatesValue = IStringItem.cast(atomicValue).asString();
193      duplicates = Duplicates.lookup(duplicatesValue);
194      if (duplicates == null) {
195        throw new JsonFunctionException(
196            JsonFunctionException.INVALID_OPTION,
197            String.format("Invalid '%s' option value '%s'.", DUPLICATES_OPTION.getKey().asString(), duplicatesValue));
198      }
199    }
200
201    // merge the maps
202    return IMapItem.ofCollection(maps.stream()
203        .flatMap(map -> map.entrySet().stream())
204        // collect the entries into a new map
205        .collect(CustomCollectors.toMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue, duplicates.getDuplicateHander(),
206            HashMap::new)));
207  }
208}
